lead_paragraph: WALDEN--Marvin Eugene, 80, of Elk Grove, CA passed away on January 9, 2016. He was born in Parsons, KS on May 7, 1935 to Mamie Lavon Walden. Marvin was raised by his aunt Mary Anne Clark and uncle Wayne Thomas Clark in Clawson, MI. He graduated from Clawson High School, and received BS, MS, and PhD degrees in Mathematics from Wayne State University. Marvin met the love of his life, beloved Olga Lucille Walden, in the Math Club at Wayne State. Marvin is survived by his children Katherine, Gerald, and Eugene, and grandchildren Anna, Charlotte, and Julia. 1/3
